rules_text:
Vigilance
{WU}, {T}: Untap each other tapped creature you control that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during your postcombat main phase.
flavor_text: [i]“You've stumbled upon the right gnome, lucky little sprites. You're not the first I've helped across the Vidyl Veldt, and you'll neither be the last.” [/i]
